item.title: Configuring the 'Web Shield' of Avast Mac Security 2016
item.description: This year at work has seen several trial and error attempts at third-party software configuration. Our school makes use of Avast Mac Security 2016. However, from Mavericks to El Capitan, we have also time and again run into roadblocks with Avast, one of which has been pushing updates and navigating the web. For reasons unknown to me, if the Web Shield is left to its default configuration, Avast will conflict with both Munki and Firefox.
